title_en: Essential Vocabulary for Gratitude and Apologies
title_vi: Từ vựng cơ bản về cảm ơn và xin lỗi
content_md: In this section, you will learn essential vocabulary related to expressing gratitude and apologies in Chinese. These phrases will help you in daily interactions, ensuring you can thank someone or apologize appropriately.
